WIMPY
Usage: wimpy [hp]
Use the WIMPY command to automatically flee once your health drops below a certain level.
Examples:
> wimpy 35 will make your character automatically flee a fight if you have less than 35 hit points. > wimpy 0 will turn off wimpy mode. > wimpy will show you your current wimp status.
See also: FLEE, TOGGLE
